warning.is_oldLatex:
Note：There are LaTeX formulas on the current page that do not save the original LaTeX code (this is usually an old topic), which makes it impossible for the script to restore them back to LaTeX, so some of the functionality of the current page is not available.
In addition, the translation function on the current page is implemented in a special way, so it may be misaligned.
warning.is_acmsguru:
Note：The current page is an acmsguru question (this is a very old question), and some functions are not applicable.
In addition, the translation function of the current page adopts a special implementation method, so typography misalignment may occur.
warning.trans_segment:
Notice! It is currently in segmented translation mode, which will cause negative effects.

Unless you need to translate a very long blog or question now, please go to the settings to switch to normal mode
warning.trans_select:
NOTE! You will only translate selected sections within the target area and click on the paragraphs to select (Aorange box)

if you don't need to translate a blog or title for too long, it is recommended that you switch to normal mode
